1.content:
As you were walking back home from school, you heard as somebody has been screaming nearby, possibly being robbed. You ran to the alley where the noises were coming from and you saw an old lady fighting off a very agressive man, that was trying to steal her purse. You ran towards him to help her, but at the same moment the lady let go off the purse, which gave the thief an oppurtunity to run away. You followed him. As you got near a corner where he turned, everything went black.

You woke up after a while, the lady was looking at you. Apparently, the guy wait for you and hit you with something. Even thougt you did not get her purse back, the lady was very grateful.
She said:,,I have looked deep into your heart young man. I will give you an ability to make your deepest desires possible. But use my gift carefully." She walked with you for a few blocks to make sure that you are ok. After a few minutes you parted ways and wished each other a good day.

You were approaching your neighborhood with a minor headache causing you to be a little disbalanced. You entered your house that was suppose to be empty at the moment, but as you entered there was...

13212112.content:
Not sure what to do standing here, you decide to go to Nick's house. On the way there you notice how awkward it is inside Nick's body. Not only is he blind without his glasses, he's scrawny which makes the journey home so much worse. People looking at you, some calling you names behind your back. If this is how Nick's life is, you're glad with yours.

At Nick's house you can see through the window his mother watching her favorite soap opera. A group of stampeding cows going through the living room wouldn't make her look away from it. This is the perfect opportunity to see if someone notices it.

Going inside you put off your shoes and walk past the living room. "Hey mom." You shout.

"Hey sweetie." She answers still looking at the television screen. Shrugging your skinny shoulders you hurry upstairs and enter Nick's room.

"Heh, heh. This is awesome." You remark seeing the sweet gaming set-up Nick has.

You start up one of your favorite games and start playing the game. You notice though playing the game is much easier somehow, like your fingers are more used to holding the controller. It might be an effect of you inside your friend's body.
